intro: Odontostemma, commonly known as the African buttercup, is a genus of flowering plants in the family Asteraceae. It is native to various parts of Africa and is characterized by its showy, yellow or orange composite flowers. The plants typically have basal leaves that are heart-shaped or ovate, and they often grow in moist, shady environments. Odontostemma species are known for their medicinal properties and have been used in traditional African medicine. Some species are also cultivated as ornamental plants due to their attractive blooms.
